name: eMule Metadata File
summary: Learn about .AHL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The AHL file can be used to limit the maximum numbers of sources that the client can connect to at one time. (Select Options→Connection, then Max Sources→File, and enter a value for "Hard Limit"). eMule will search and connect to sources until the Hard Limit value is reached.

description: Configuration file used by eMule, a peer-to-peer (P2P) file sharing program; replaces eDonkey, an earlier file sharing client.
